about.about_us_description: Anousith Express - Fast, Safe, and Reliable Delivery Service Across Laos and Internationally
about.start: Starting with only 5 branches in Vientiane, we have rapidly expanded and now have a network of over 400+ branches nationwide, covering every province in Laos and connecting with global networks.
about.service: With a team of experienced professionals and cutting-edge technology, we have become one of the leaders in logistics and transportation services in Laos, handling over 1 million transactions per month.
about.history_description: Anousith Express was founded in 2015 with the aim to provide high-quality, convenient, and reasonably priced delivery services for businesses and individuals across Laos.
about.mission_description: Every action and decision of ours is guided by our core principles
about.description1: Providing the most efficient, reliable, safe, and timely delivery services at affordable prices to connect businesses and people in Laos and the region.
about.description2: Being a leader in logistics and transportation using the latest technology of Laos, creating the most trusted connections between people, businesses, and communities.
about.title: Ready to serve you in all your transportation needs
about.description: Whether you are a small business, large corporation, or individual, we have transportation solutions tailored to meet all of your needs.
about.point1_description: Over 400+ branches nationwide in Laos, covering all provinces and major cities.
about.point2_description: Same-day delivery for the capital and 1-3 days for other provinces.
about.point3_description: Real-time tracking system and parcel insurance for peace of mind.
about.point4_description: Excellent 24/7 customer service and a user-friendly mobile app.

contact.contact_us_description: We are here to assist you with all your shipping needs.
contact.call_us_24_7: We are available 24/7 to assist you.
contact.working_hours_details: Our operating hours are as follows:
contact.send_message_description: Have questions or suggestions? Please fill out the form below, and our team will get back to you shortly.
contact.name: Full Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.address: Podsaad Village, Jantabouly District, Vientiane Capital, Lao PDR
contact.text_1: We understand that your logistics needs never stop, and our customer service team is the same.
contact.text_2: We are available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Whether you need to track a parcel, have questions about our services, or need any help, we are here to assist you.
contact.faq_description: Answers to common questions regarding our services
contact.question1: How can we track our parcels?
contact.answer1: You can track your parcels via our website or mobile app by entering your tracking code. Additionally, you will receive notifications via SMS or email each time there is an update on your parcel's status.
contact.question2: How does COD (Cash on Delivery) work?
contact.answer2: Our COD service allows you to collect payments from your customers when we deliver the goods. We will transfer the money to your account within 1-2 business days, with a nominal fee of 1,000 kip per delivery.
contact.question3: What is the standard delivery time?
contact.answer3: The delivery time depends on the destination. Generally, within Vientiane city, it is within 1 day, for large cities 1-2 days, and for distant areas, 2-3 days. We also offer express delivery services for same-day or next-day delivery.
contact.question4: What are the maximum weight and size limits?
contact.answer4: We can handle parcels from small items to large goods such as furniture and electronics. The maximum weight depends on the type of service, but generally, we can manage items weighing over 100 kilograms.

Policy.things_to_know: Things to know before using the service:
Policy.title: Our Various Policies
Policy.0: Service fee starts at 6,500 LAK for inter-provincial delivery, sent today, received tomorrow.
Policy.1: Service fee 5,000 LAK within Vientiane Capital, same-day delivery.
Policy.2: For remote areas in the city: Additional 5,000 LAK per package.
Policy.4: The company will provide compensation for damages of goods up to 500,000 LAK per package only.
Policy.5: 1.1. Type of plastic bags or sealed plastic bags: Suitable for products like flat sheets, soft fabrics that are not prone to damage when handled or during transportation. The bag should be sealed tightly every time.
Policy.6: 1.2. Suitable for products that require special care and products that are at risk of breaking, cracking, or easy to damage, and should be additionally wrapped in bubble foam to prevent impact damage during transportation that could lead to easy damage.
Policy.7: ຂໍ້ຈຳກັດຄວາມ
Policy.8: 2.1. "We", "Our", or "Ours" refers to Anousith Logistics Co., Ltd., employees, subcontractors, or agents.
Policy.9: 2.2. "You" or "Your" refers to the shipper, equipment sender, and the name listed as the sender on the shipment document.
Policy.10: 2.3. "Shipper" refers to the person listed as the sender on the shipment document and also the contractor in the shipment document.
Policy.11: 2.4. "Sender" refers to the person sending the parcel to us, who may not be the shipper.
Policy.12: 2.5. "Consignee" refers to the person listed as the consignee on the shipment document.
Policy.13: 2.6. "Receiver" refers to the person or recipient of the parcel. He/she may be the consignee or another individual at the consignee's address or office address.
Policy.14: 2.7. “ພັດສຸດ” ເຫົາຄືບັນຈຸພາຍໃນ / ຫ່ອຫຸມທັງຫມົດທີ່ສົ່ງເຫົາເຫົາແລະ ຮັບເຫົາເຫົາໃນການຂົນສົ່ງໃນເຫົາໃບສົ່ງສິນຄ້າ
Policy.15: 2.8. “ໃບສົ່ງສິນຄ້າ” ເຫົາຄືໃບກາຕາບາສົ່ງ ຫຼື ເອກະສານອື່ນທີ່ທີ່ກັບໃນຮູບແບບກະທົບເຈກະຕິຫຼື ອິລັກທຣອນິກທີ່ກ່ຽວກັບພັດສຸດ
Policy.16: 2.9. “ຂໍ້ຕົກລົງ ແລະ ເງື່ອນຄ່າ” ເຫົາຄືຂໍ້ຕົກລົງ ແລະ ເງື່ອນຄ່າມາຕຣານຫຼື ປະກອບກັບມາຕຣານທີ່ການແກ້ໄຂ ຫຼື ເພິ່ງປະກອບກັບຄວາມຮັບມອບເຮົາ
Policy.17: 2.10. “ວັນທຳການ” ເຫົາຄືວັນຈັນທຸງວັນສຸກຈາກວັນພັກພາຍຫຼືມິດວົງມາດມີຫວັບມາສົກົາຫຼັກນຳນິຄົດ.
